descriptionHTML:
Chromium Watch Face!

Analog watch face for Android wear with a dark background with chrome numbers. Battery friendly with Elegant design.

Features of the watch face:

- Watch battery indicator
- Day of Month
- Month
- Battery Friendly

Supported devices:

- Works on all Android Wear devices.

More watch faces

- Discover our watchface collection for Android Wear on the Play Store:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=NorthTribe+Ltd﻿
comments: Needs full ambient mode Ambient mode has no detail at all, will get repurchase if a full ambient mode option is added.
Doesn't work not worth anything. It should be free as a matter of fact about 2 get refund
